attributes.additional_details:
I watch Parliament on a regular basis but I am tempted to stop

The office of Speaker of The House of Commons should be impartial

This is not the case with the current Speaker - John Bercow

He is always for want of a better phrase - slapping down Conservative contributors whilst allowing Labour free rain

It is about time we had a Speaker who was truly impartial

This is the only view the general public have of how the House of Commons works and it is not a very good example
